thread.title: NA LCS Spring Split Week 7 [Mar 10th - Mar 12th]
thread.title_full: NA LCS Spring Split Week 7 [Mar 10th - Mar 12th]

author: Aznbeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: NA LCS Spring Split Week 7 [Mar 10th - Mar 12th]
text:
The NA LCS returns with the seventh week of the 2017 Spring Split!
Continue reading for a spoiler free look at this week's games, including team info, schedules, and VODs!

( Please be aware that this post WILL BE UPDATED as the action continues throughout the week. VODs and any other pertinent info will be posted once available! ) 

2017 NA LCS Spring Week 7 
The  2017 NA LCS Spring Split  features North America's top ten teams -  Team Solomid, FlyQuest, Echo Fox, Cloud9, Team Envy, Team Liquid, Team Dignitas, Phoenix1 ,  Counter Logic Gaming , and  Immortals  - playing against each other for championship points and a chance to represent their region at the 2017 World Championship!

Catch up on the full NA LCS rules  here  or browse the 2017 season changes article  here .

LCS Spring Split Week 7  will be played on   patch 7.4. 

[ NOTE : As of March 7th, Doublelift has left CLG and is now playing AD Carry for Team Liquid ! ]

Standings: Here are the standings & results from  Week 6 :

Stream: 
Stream link NALCS1 Twitch  //  Youtube  //  Azubu TV
